meta.title: Golden Retriever vs French Bulldog: Which is Right for You?
meta.description: Compare Golden Retrievers and French Bulldogs on energy, size, cost, and lifestyle fit.

intro.short_hook: Compare Golden Retrievers and French Bulldogs on energy, size, cost, and lifestyle fit.
intro.who_is_asking_this: Potential owners deciding between these two breeds.

quick_answers.question: What is the key takeaway?
quick_answers.answer: This is a sample quick answer for validation purposes.

summary_verdict.one_sentence_verdict: If you want an active partner for outdoor adventures, pick the Golden Retriever. If you want a low-maintenance cuddle buddy for your apartment, the French Bulldog is the winner.
